item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 6, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Automatically tagging politician when they use their phone on the livestreams (121 points | 61 comments)

27. Yoke: Infrastructure as code, but actually (87 points | 79 comments)

29. Solving First Order Differential Equations with Julia (95 points | 27 comments)
